author: wddgit
body:
#### PR description:

Fix bug related to cmsRun exit code with FileReadError exception. It was returning 8001 instead of 8021. See Issue #42179 for more discussion.

#### PR validation:

Relies on existing tests. In addition, there is a new unit test in 14_0_X.

#### This is a backport to 13_1_X of PR #43579. The backport is needed because the bug makes it more difficult for operators to diagnose operational failures.
title: Fix bug related to cmsRun exit code with FileReadError, 13_1_X backport
